abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration solicits development proposals for Sunnyside Yards rail depot in Queens, pressing ahead to explore affordable housing project that has been rebuffed by Gov Andrew Cuomo's office.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio hopes developers will build more than 11,000 units of affordable housing in Sunnyside Yards.

headline.main: Despite Cuomo’s Opposition, de Blasio Requests Housing Proposals for Queens Rail Depot
headline.print_headline: Despite Cuomo’s Opposition, de Blasio Requests Housing Proposals for Queens Rail Depot

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio hopes developers will build more than 11,000 units of affordable housing in Sunnyside Yards.
